instruction: Discuss the importance of ESG integration in investment analysis and portfolio management based on the results of the COVID-19 pandemic.
output: The COVID-19 pandemic has highlighted the importance of ESG integration in investment analysis and portfolio management. Companies with strong ESG characteristics suffered smaller drawdowns in relative terms during the pandemic. This relative outperformance was attributed to ESG and not just other defensive factors like quality and low volatility. This confirms that ESG can mitigate systematic and idiosyncratic risk. With increasing recognition of the profound impact of environmental and social changes on long-term portfolios, ESG integration has gained acceptance in investment analysis and portfolio management in recent years.
